about_the_game:
From now on, you are God!
Explore, nurture, manage and... The adventurers.

[Town hall]
Hold town activities, formulate taxes, and enhance the town's star rating.

[Tavern]
Recruit adventurers, serve drinks and earn gold.

[Adventurers Association]
Release materials and entrust tasks to provide advanced services for adventurers.

[Central Square]
Team up for expeditions, you can have a walkthrough for featured copies.

[Hotel]
Operate hotels, provide accommodation, a variety of food and other services.

[Weapon shop/armor shop/Jewelry shop/Alchemy shop]
Make items, price them and sell them to adventurers or visitors.

[Warrior Guild/Mage Guild/Priest Guild/Thief Guild]
Offer job transfer, training, research, learning skills and other services.

[Church]
Resurrect the adventurer and pray to the gods for protection.

[Workshop]
Research equipment formula, develop urban science and technology, improve the overall strength.

[Refining Research Institute]
Enhanced weapons, increased rarity. Disassemble equipment to get some material back.

[Trading center]
Trade in used equipment, trade in materials.

[bank]
Selling "golden keys" to adventurers to raise money for the town.

[Farm]
Work to obtain basic ingredients to make drinks and food to sell to adventurers.

[Hot air Balloon exploration]
Select a copy to explore offline and earn special effects material.

[Ocean Trade Center]
The ocean trade sold goods and gained more wealth.

Salute to every brave man!
detailed_description:
Trial version 1.05 update

1. The clearance area will reward 3 types of boxes to open and obtain rare items.
2. Publish tasks and add batch settings.
3. Beautify UI and bugs.


About the Demo

From now on, you are God!
Explore, nurture, manage and... The adventurers.

[Town hall]
Hold town activities, formulate taxes, and enhance the town's star rating.

[Tavern]
Recruit adventurers, serve drinks and earn gold.

[Adventurers Association]
Release materials and entrust tasks to provide advanced services for adventurers.

[Central Square]
Team up for expeditions, you can have a walkthrough for featured copies.

[Hotel]
Operate hotels, provide accommodation, a variety of food and other services.

[Weapon shop/armor shop/Jewelry shop/Alchemy shop]
Make items, price them and sell them to adventurers or visitors.

[Warrior Guild/Mage Guild/Priest Guild/Thief Guild]
Offer job transfer, training, research, learning skills and other services.

[Church]
Resurrect the adventurer and pray to the gods for protection.

[Workshop]
Research equipment formula, develop urban science and technology, improve the overall strength.

[Refining Research Institute]
Enhanced weapons, increased rarity. Disassemble equipment to get some material back.

[Trading center]
Trade in used equipment, trade in materials.

[bank]
Selling "golden keys" to adventurers to raise money for the town.

[Farm]
Work to obtain basic ingredients to make drinks and food to sell to adventurers.

[Hot air Balloon exploration]
Select a copy to explore offline and earn special effects material.

[Ocean Trade Center]
The ocean trade sold goods and gained more wealth.

Salute to every brave man!
name: 幻想小镇Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7以上です
  • Processor: デュアルコアCPU, 2 GHzです
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win7以上です
  • Processor: デュアルコアCPU, 2 GHzです
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

short_description: You will play the role of "God", running various buildings and facilities to attract more believers. Recruit and train family members, provide them with equipment, food, accommodation and other services, build legendary equipment, help them hunt monsters and challenge bosses.
